I converted this to DVD with ConvertX2DVD 2.2.3.258 and it is perfect.

> I converted this to DVD with ConvertX2DVD 2.2.3.258 and it is perfect.

Sorry, this is not correct.

I have converted this twice in ConvertX 2.2.3.258, both checking and un-checking the DeInterleave option, and both result in obvious interleave problems.  I get that annoying splinting of hard edges.  I do not have a solution.   :-(
